action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this grid and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your grid first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the grids to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short grid description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else. This is your grid:
X X X X X
X ▢ ▢ ▢ ▢
X X X ▢ ▢
X ▢ ▢ ▢ ▢
X X X X X

DESCRIPTION: The grid consists of 5 rows and 5 columns. The top and bottom rows are fully filled with Xs. The second row has three Xs and two empty spaces represented by ▢. The third row has three Xs, one empty space, and another X. The fourth row mirrors the second row with three Xs and two empty spaces. The fifth and final row is identical to the first, fully filled with Xs.
continue

DESCRIPTION: The grid consists of a 5x5 matrix. The pattern is as follows: The first and last rows, as well as the first and last columns, are filled with empty squares (▢). The center row and center column are filled with Xs (X), creating a cross shape in the middle of the grid. The remaining squares are empty.
